text: Essam Kamal Tawfiq El Hadary (; born 15 January 1973) is an Egyptian goalkeeping coach and former professional footballer. == Career statistics == === International === : Statistics in 8 October 2017. Egypt national team Year Apps Goals 1996 2 0 1997 9 0 1998 4 0 1999 6 0 2000 3 0 2001 6 0 2002 14 0 2003 3 0 2004 6 0 2005 5 0 2006 11 0 2007 9 0 2008 18 0 2009 16 0 2010 11 0 2011 2 0 2012 13 0 2013 1 0 2014 4 0 2015 0 0 2016 4 0 2017 9 0 Total 156 0 == Honours == * Egyptian Premier League: 1996–97, 1997–98, 1998–99, 1999–2000, 2004–05, 2005–06, 2006–07, 2007–08 * Egypt Cup: 2000–01, 2002–03, 2005–06, 2006–07 * Egyptian Super Cup: 2003, 2005, 2006, 2007 * CAF Champions League: 2001, 2005, 2006, 2008 * CAF Super Cup: 2002, 2006, 2007 * Arab Club Champions Cup: 1996 * Arab Super Cup: 1997, 1998 ; Sion * Swiss Cup: 2008–09 ; Al- Merreikh * Sudan Premier League: 2011 * Sudan Cup: 2012 ; International * All- Africa Games: 1995 * Africa Cup of Nations: 1998, 2006, 2008, 2010 * Pan Arab Games: 2007 === Individual === * Africa Cup of Nations Team of all Tournaments: 2006, 2008, 2010. ==Footnotes== == References == == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1973 births Category:Egyptian footballers Category:Living people Category:Egypt international footballers
title: Essam El-Hadary
